entry.title: Friday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or snow. Local rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
